TextView.android:text: ‘Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of human’.

Hydraulic crane is a device, used for raising or transferring heavy loads. In this system power is transmitted with the help of a fluid like water or oil under pressure. Hydraulic cranes work using the concept of transmitting a force from one point to another point through an incompressible fluid. Example in real worlds loader crane, mobile cranes, truck mounted crane, tower crane etc.
